code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./List.css";import*as restaurantData from"./data/restaurant.json";var List=function List(props){var moyenneAvis=function moyenneAvis(restaurant){var totalStars=restaurant.ratings.map(function(rating){return rating.stars;}).reduce(function(previousValue,currentValue,index,array){return index+1===array.length?(previousValue+currentValue)/array.length:previousValue+currentValue;});return totalStars.toFixed(1);};return restaurantData?React.createElement("ul",null,restaurantData.features.map(function(restaurant){return React.createElement("li",{key:restaurant.restaurantID,onClick:function onClick(){console.log("Selection du restaurant : "+restaurant.restaurantName);}},React.createElement("img",{className:"imgRestaurant",src:restaurant.img,alt:"Le restaurant"}),React.createElement("div",{style:{marginTop:"auto",marginBottom:"auto"}},React.createElement("h2",null,restaurant.restaurantName),React.createElement("div",{className:"moyenneAvis"},React.createElement("span",{style:{verticalAlign:'middle'}},moyenneAvis(restaurant)),React.createElement("img",{src:"etoile.png",className:"imgAvis",alt:"Etoile des avis"})),React.createElement("div",{className:"adresse"},restaurant.address)));})):React.createElement("div",null,"Chargement des restaurants...");};export default List;
